title: (x) "Annie" soft serif musical logo - similar to Goudy Heavyface {Lex}
content: You know, the one used for Little Orphan Annie... I can't find it or a similar enough one anywhere! HELP!!!
author: boomerang

comments.content: C'mon, if you want us to help, at least go to the trouble of tracking down a sample or link.
Thanks for the replies- now I'm searching for a place to snag these two fonts... :)
Uh, i don't like the sound of that 'snag'....

I'd also recommend [Goudy Heavyface Condensed.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150225002821/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=BT.107630.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Annie&sampleSize=48) It, and the other fonts, can all be found at FontShop.

- Lex
Ooh- I like the Goudy Heavyface one- looks like that will work well with what I'm doing. Thanks!
